title: How Big Should It Be?
description:
Pablo Torre, Domonique Foxworth and Spencer Hall debate if Kevin Durant warrants the biggest trade package ever and if after Zion’s presser yesterday they are confident things are going to work out for him in New Orleans.
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
itunes:author: ESPN
itunes:subtitle: (debatable): How Many Assets Should Teams Give Up For Kevin Durant?
